levels.description: Immediately gains <@ba.vup>{cost}</> DP; Deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage <@ba.vup>twice</> to all nearby enemies and <$ba.stun>Stuns</> them for <@ba.vup>{stun}</> seconds
